name: repo-radar
title: Repo Radar
description: Lightning-fast project launcher with aliases, IDE + Terminal support, Git status, favorites, groups, and smart sorting
author: zander_zi

commands.name: open-project
commands.title: Go
commands.subtitle: Repo Radar
commands.description: Search and launch projects in IDE, Terminal, or both

commands.name: manage-projects
commands.title: Add Project
commands.subtitle: Repo Radar
commands.description: Create project alias with IDE, Terminal, and group settings

commands.name: clear-data
commands.title: Clear All Data
commands.subtitle: Repo Radar
commands.description: Delete all projects and reset extension data

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
